features: Our lightest ever pacifier: The Tommee Tippee Ultra-Light silicone pacifier is light enough to stay put in in baby’s mouth for longer, so you don’t need to replace it every few minutes
Symmetrical design: Our Ultra-Light pacifier features a symmetrical silicone nipple and with no ‘wrong’ side up, it will always be placed correctly in baby’s mouth
Acceptance guaranteed: Accepted by 97.5% of babies*, the 100% medical-grade, BPA-free silicone nipple is silky-soft and flexible with a skin-like feel and texture, for a familiar feeling for baby
Kind on baby’s skin: The curved shield ensures a comfortable fit between baby’s nose and chin and the large holes allow extra air flow and prevent moisture build-up to help prevent skin irritation
Dust-free and easy to clean: The hygienic, anti-static properties prevent dust from settling and the one-piece design is really easy to clean – dishwasher safe
body.description: The instinctive action of sucking helps to calm and soothe babies and all parents know theres nothing more wonderful than a calm, content baby. Little mouths dont always hold onto heavy baby pacifiers which means parents often need to replace the pacifier in their babys mouth every few minutes. Our Ultra-Light Silicone pacifier is our lightest ever pacifier and is light enough to stay put in babys mouth for longer helping babies to stay calmer, soothed and happier for longer. As the symmetrical silicone baglet is fully reversible, there is no wrong side-up so the pacifier will always be placed correctly in your babys mouth, even when they put it in their mouth themselves. The curved shield sits comfortably between babys chin and nose and the holes in each side allow extra air flow and prevent the build-up of moisture which helps to protect babys delicate skin against irritation. The smooth surface of silicone is very easy to clean and wont absorb stains and odors. The hygienic, anti-static properties prevent dust from settling and as it has a one-piece design, it is really easy to clean - simply pop in a sterilizer, wash by hand or in the top shelf of the dishwasher. We recommend that you replace the pacifier every month and always at the first signs of damage or weakness. We recommend against prolonged pacifier use over 24 months and stopping pacifier use when your child is older than 36 months*From an independent study in July 2021 of 416 moms with a 0-36m child, who are currently using a Tommee Tippee pacifier: *99% of moms would recommend a Tommee Tippee pacifier *97% of moms say a Tommee Tippee pacifier helped settle baby *93% of moms say babies love their Tommee Tippee pacifier 97.5% of babies accept a Tommee Tippee pacifier

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A weight off your mind Pacifiers are a brilliant way to keep your baby calm and content. Until they drop out. Then the constant task of retrieving and replacing is exhausting and draining for both of you! To keep bad moods at bay, we’ve created our lightest pacifier yet. Designed to stay put in your baby’s mouth, our Ultra-Light silicone pacifier can help everyone stay calmer and happier for longer.

Symmetrical design The symmetrical, soft silicone baglet is fully reversible and has no ‘wrong’ side-up so the pacifier will always be placed correctly in your baby’s mouth, even when baby puts the pacifier in their mouth themselves. Acceptance guaranteed Accepted by 97.5% of babies**, our Ultra- Light pacifiers are made from 100% medical-grade silicone. Silicone is a soft and flexible but extremely durable material. Love by moms and babies, our pacifiers help to settle baby with 99% of moms recommending to others. ** Silky-soft Made from super-soft 100% medical-grade silicone, this silky-smooth pacifier gives it a skin-like feel and texture, so it feels familiar in baby’s mouth. Silicone is a soft and flexible but extremely durable material which is taste-free and won’t retain any stains or odors.

Ultimate comfort The pacifier shield curves at the top and the bottom to ensure that it sits comfortably between baby’s chin and nose. The holes in the shield allow extra air flow and prevent the build-up of moisture thereby helping to protect baby’s delicate skin against irritation. Available in different age stages The Ultra-Light pacifier is suitable for use from birth and is available in two age stages. The 0-6-month size features a smaller teat and shield for tiny mouths and noses. As your baby grows, you can switch to the 6-18m pacifier which offers the same benefits but with a larger teat and shield. Dust-free & easy to clean Hygienic, anti-static properties help prevent dust from settling on this pacifier, so you know it’s safe to put in baby’s mouth. The one-piece design is simple to wash in hot, soapy water, pop in your sterilizer or top shelf of your dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best pacifier for babies
reviews.reviewText: These are the best pacifiers for babies and moms they are soft and excellent for babies sensitive skin and easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great pacifiers. Work well and nice bright colors so they’re easy to find when dropped.They do bounce a little… so if your child throws them.. they travel lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST pacifiers!
reviews.reviewText: Nothing beats the Tommee Tippee pacifiers. They have fun colors, are easy to clean, are very good quality, and most importantly my baby loves them! He’s loved these since day one! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pacifiers EVER!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Our baby has 4 packs of these throughout the house. No hard plastic to worry about like other types. Baby can chew on them from every angle without issue. Plus, even face plant and sleep on them without causing indents 🤣 easy sterilizing and washing. Can squeeze into any diaper bag pouch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great shipping time and excellent product. Our baby loves these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My child’s favorite
reviews.reviewText: These are so hard to find anywhere. So glad I was able to find a pack of them. We keep a couple in the crib for him. These are his favorite and also love to chew on them since they are soft and helps with teething.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We love Tommee Tippee Products
reviews.reviewText: My son has been using these pacis since day one. Usually buy them from Walmart but took a gamble with purchasing through Amazon and wasn’t disappointed. Cute new colors that we haven’t used before now, and came wrapped in cute tissue as well as original packaging.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only pacifiers my son will take
reviews.reviewText: We used this brand in the hospital and never looked back. We just upped sizes because these are the only pacifiers my son likes. He was breastfed and rejected anything else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024

reviews.reviewText: My son loves these, he kept dropping other heavier ones but these ones are much easier to suck and hold onto. Exactly what I needed
